Security & Vulnerability Reporting

Report a Security
Vulnerability

Help us keep LogYourBody secure. If you've discovered a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly through this form.

Our Security Commitment

We take security seriously and appreciate responsible disclosure. Valid reports will be acknowledged within 24 hours and resolved based on severity level.

Vulnerability Report Form

Please provide as much detail as possible to help us understand and resolve the issue.

Reporter Information

Vulnerability Details

Reporting Guidelines

✅ Do

  • • Provide detailed reproduction steps
  • • Include impact assessment
  • • Test in a safe environment
  • • Report promptly after discovery

❌ Don't

  • • Access user data without permission
  • • Perform destructive testing
  • • Publicly disclose before resolution
  • • Spam our systems

Response Timeline

Acknowledgment:24-48 hours
Critical issues:1-3 days
High severity:1-2 weeks
Medium/Low:2-4 weeks

Alternative Contact

For urgent security issues, you can also reach us directly:

security@logyourbody.com
GitHub Security

Our Security Measures

We implement multiple layers of security to protect your data and privacy.

End-to-End Encryption

All personal health data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard AES-256 encryption.

Privacy by Design

We collect only the minimum data necessary and give you full control over your information.

Regular Security Audits

Our systems undergo regular security assessments and penetration testing by third-party experts.

SOC 2 Compliance

We maintain SOC 2 Type II compliance for security, availability, and confidentiality.
